item.title: Started Blogging With Hugo
item.description: I started my First Blog in 2011 with Blogger. As I recalled the name first blog site I created was “Science Journal”. Then after some time during my AL’s I created a WordPress blog and posted some articles related to AI. But those blogs re disappeared in sands of time. In 2016, during my pre-university time, I started doing the blog Joural of Isuru Sachitha seriously, where I have posted articles on academics mostly based on Computer Engineering.
